feed.title: ShellHub Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.15.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: upgrade MongoDB from 4.4.8 to 4.4.29 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3773
  • chore: update cli service in docker-compose by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3774
  • chore: remove deprecated scripts by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3775
  • fix: resolve numeric argument error in CLI script by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3776
  • feat: improve CLI error handling and docker-compose execution by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3777
  • chore(cli): switch from refresh to air for hot-reload in dev mode by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3779
  • test(ui): added welcome screens tests by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3778
  • account lockouts by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3648
  • remove mongo-migrate replace by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3780
  • refactor(agent,pkg): centralize OS dependent functions for authentication by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3771
  • feature(agent,pkg): add support for FreeBSD in host mode by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3772
  • docker: gateway: bump nginx from 1.25.5-alpine to 1.26.0-alpine in /gateway by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3783
  • ui: bump vue-router from 4.3.0 to 4.3.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3784
  • ui: bump terser from 5.30.3 to 5.30.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3785
  • ui: bump @sentry/tracing from 7.110.0 to 7.112.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3786
  • ui: bump @fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons from 6.5.1 to 6.5.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3787
  • ui: bump vite from 5.2.8 to 5.2.10 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3788
  • docker: ui: bump nginx from 1.25.5-alpine to 1.26.0-alpine in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3789
  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3782
  • Bump shellhub version to 0.15.1-rc.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3791
  • fix(ui): corrected response data from mfa store action by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3794
  • fix(api): allow device with uppercase name by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3793
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.15.1-rc.2 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3795
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.15.1-rc.3 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3796
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.15.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3800

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.15.0...v0.15.1

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ui: bump @sentry/vue from 7.109.0 to 7.113.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3801
  • ui: bump vite from 5.2.10 to 5.2.11 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3803
  • ui: bump vite-node from 1.5.0 to 1.6.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3804
  • ui: bump @rushstack/eslint-patch from 1.8.0 to 1.10.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3805
  • refactor(api): remove unused cloud code by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3790
  • centralize user's update operation by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3798
  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.5.13 to 3.6.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3802
  • feat(api,cli,pkg): proper method to lookup user conflicts by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3808
  • refactor: jwttoken package by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3806
  • docker: api: bump golang from 1.21.8-alpine3.19 to 1.22.3-alpine3.19 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3812
  • docker: ssh: bump golang from 1.21.8-alpine3.19 to 1.22.3-alpine3.19 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3813
  • ssh: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3814
  • ui: bump sass from 1.75.0 to 1.77.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3816
  • ui: bump @vue/test-utils from 2.4.5 to 2.4.6 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3817
  • ui: bump @types/node from 18.19.31 to 18.19.33 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3818
  • ui: bump @sentry/tracing from 7.112.2 to 7.114.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3819
  • docker: cli: bump golang from 1.22.2-alpine3.19 to 1.22.3-alpine3.19 in /cli by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3824
  • docker: agent: bump arm32v7/golang from 1.21.8-alpine3.19 to 1.22.3-alpine3.19 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3826
  • docker: agent: bump arm32v6/golang from 1.21.8-alpine3.19 to 1.22.3-alpine3.19 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3827
  • docker: agent: bump arm64v8/golang from 1.21.8-alpine3.19 to 1.22.3-alpine3.19 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3828
  • api: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3821
  • ssh: bump golang.org/x/net from 0.24.0 to 0.25.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3815
  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 5 to 6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3825
  • api: bump github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-go/modules/mongodb from 0.30.0 to 0.31.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3822
  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.6.3 to 3.6.5 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3820
  • fix(tests): disable Ryuk due bug by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3829
  • fix(agent): close exec data pipe on old agents by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3830
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.15.2-rc.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3831
  • docker: agent: bump golang from 1.21.8-alpine3.19 to 1.22.3-alpine3.19 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3832
  • ui: bump eslint-plugin-vue from 9.25.0 to 9.26.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3835
  • ui: bump @vue/runtime-dom from 3.4.21 to 3.4.27 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3836

  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.6.5 to 3.6.6 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3834
  • ui: bump vee-validate from 4.12.6 to 4.12.8 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3833
  • feature(agent,pkg): add connector mode by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3809
  • chore(api,cli,pkg): rename password package to hash by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3838

  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.6.6 to 3.6.7 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3843
  • feat: recovery email by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3849
  • refactor: mfa store by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3799
  • docker: gateway: bump nginx from 1.26.0-alpine to 1.27.0-alpine in /gateway by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3851
  • docker: ui: bump nginx from 1.26.0-alpine to 1.27.0-alpine in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3852
  • ui: bump vite from 5.2.11 to 5.2.12 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3853

  • ui: bump @vitejs/plugin-vue from 5.0.4 to 5.0.5 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3855
  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.6.7 to 3.6.8 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3856
  • refactor(api): new api-key implementation by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3839
  • refactor(api,pkg): move admin code by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3797
  • refactor(ui): update mfa to the newest refactor by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3850
  • fix(ui): update recovery email input on enabling the mfa by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3858
  • feat(ui): validate the namespace add modal on community by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3860
  • fix(ssh): add tenant on tunnel dial to close a session by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3861

  • fix(api,ssh,pkg): update session type when data piped by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3859

  • @haller33 made their first contribution in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3887

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.17.0
entry.content:
ShellHub v0.17.0 - Release Notes

We're excited to announce the release of ShellHub v0.17.0! This version introduces several improvements, new features, and essential bug fixes that enhance the overall performance and usability of the platform. Below is a summary of the key changes.

🔥 New Features

  • Namespace Invitations: Streamlined the process of inviting members to a namespace using emails, making team collaboration easier.
  • Namespace Options: Added support for retrieving namespace options, including enhanced management capabilities.
  • Premium Paywall Enhancements: Introduced a paywall for premium features in the community edition, with increased integration into the UI and cloud services.
  • Containers Route Alias: Added an alias for container listings, enabling easier filtering and management of containers.
  • Debugging Symbols in Development: Integrated debugging symbols in the development environment for API and SSH services.

🚀 Improvements

  • UI Enhancements:
  • Improved sidebar styling and navigation for better user experience.
  • Introduced new breadcrumb-based navigation for better context in the UI.
  • Persistent hints and placeholders in terminal dialog fields for a more intuitive interface.

  • Increased content padding and improved spacing in the paywall interface.

  • Backend Performance:

  • Optimized DNS resolution and dynamic hostname resolution in the gateway.
  • Introduced cache management using generics to boost system efficiency.

  • Improved session and member data handling with streamlined query processes.

  • New Connector Service Requirements: Updated the gateway to manage connector services, providing robust and secure service handling.

🛠 Fixes

  • MFA Proxy Adjustments: Resolved issues with MFA authentication redirects in the gateway.
  • Namespace Creation: Fixed issues where certain users could not create namespaces.
  • Session Cleanup: Addressed bugs related to session handling and cleanup for better resource management.
  • User Invitations: Ensured correct handling of user membership invitations and status updates.

⚙️ Dependency Updates

  • Updated various dependencies for improved security and stability, including:
  • Vue, TypeScript, Axios, FontAwesome, and Vuetify in the UI.
  • Go dependencies in the API, agent, and SSH services.

📦 General Improvements

  • Installer Updates: Overhauled the installation scripts for smoother setup and configuration.
  • OpenAPI Generator Removal: Simplified the project by removing unused OpenAPI generator dependencies.

📝 Other Changes

  • Miscellaneous fixes, typos, and performance enhancements across the platform to ensure smoother and more reliable operation.

Upgrade now to take advantage of these improvements and enjoy a better ShellHub experience! As always, we appreciate your feedback and support in helping us make ShellHub even better.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0
